column5: hey, can anyone recommend some good crank baits for the largemouth bass bite on Lac Seul???/(#### i crack myself up)
i don't think there are any.
[font color=green size=3][b]Any bass in Lac Suel should be a smallmouth, largemouth are not normally found that far North.
don't waste your time with the largemouth. Spend more time fishing for the great Lac Seul catfish and bluegills. Give us an update when you get back

Personally suggest Uncle Larry's garlic carp stink bait. Those stumps suckers up there absolutly go bonkers over the stuff. 150-200 per day is VERY common. Use a catfish treble with a 1oz pencil weight rigged on a 3way troll @ max boat speed. HANG ON cuz they really fight hard!! Good luck...
